name: Steampunker
description: Discover Steamburg's developers new game ! Steampunker is an award-winning point and click adventure game involving a search for hidden objects. It's set in an astonishing steampunk world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: Intel Core i3 @ 1.7 GHz Dual core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600 GT DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista 64-bit or newer Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.0 GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 640 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space
